description.value: If the character has gained at least 1 Pain Token during an encounter, they may spend a Fate Point to gain the Berserk Charge Talent and Brutal Charge Traits for the rest of the encounter. Berserk Charge: When using the Charge Action, gain +20 to WS instead of the usual +10 Brutal Charge: Deals 3 extra damage with attacks made while charging.
